title: Start
body:
Hey there!
[[Hi |#1]]
[[<<Inventory.Has(Blueberries)&&Inventory.Has(Strawberries)&&Inventory.Has(Jam)&&Inventory.Has(Mint)&&Inventory.Has(Chamomile)&&<<Inventory.Has(Teapot)>>I think I found all you asked for |#12]]

You can dance with us too, if you want! It's fun!
[[Thanks,I've got some business to attend to |#2]]

Looking for that star, eh? We've came here to find it too, we even spent like 20 minutes searching the forest. But we finished as always - dancing our butts off!
[[Looks like you're having fun |#3]]

You bet! Come join us any time! 
[[Kk. I was actually wondering if I could borrow a record player for a little? |#4]]

Sure! We actually want to take a break from dancing and have some tea
[[Sound great |#5]]

But the thing is - none of us actually wants to do all the preparation. Can you help us out with some ingredients? 
[[Are they hard to find? |#6]]

No, not really. But there are quite a few, so listen carefully:
[[... |#7]]

You can take our teapot with water in it, it's on the picnic carpet
[[... |#8]]

And then you'll also need some blueberries, strawberries, chamomiles, mint and some jam!
[[Is it really necessary to have both berries and jam at the same time? |#9]]

Of course it is! Everything's better with jam,trust me, I know
[[Okay |#10]]

Bring us all the ingredients and we'll take it from there! And you'll get to take the player for as long as you need it
[[Fine |#11]]

Yay, thank you so much! You can take the record player now, and we'll have a tea party!
[[Thanks |#13]]
